comments.author: AfterXII.2761
comments.body:
Hey guys,

I know it has been mentioned that you guys are putting out small fires before returning to new API deployments.

Out of curiosity, will these 2 new APIs (similar to the skin and dye account APIs you recently released) be released before HoT arrives?

Thanks in advance!
-RG
